ai-thag1.90:1.1_0: The five aggregates are fully understood;
ai-thag1.90:1.2_0: they remain, but their root is cut.
ai-thag1.90:1.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
ai-thag1.90:1.7_0: The ninth sub-chapter on incomplete assembly is finished.
ai-thag1.90:2.2_0: Kassapa is the land of the Sīha.
